title: ASC Kédia
text:
ASC Kédia is a <a href="Mauritania">Mauritanean</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Zou%C3%A9rat">Zouérat</a> the capital of the <a href="Tiris%20Zemmour">Tiris Zemmour</a> region.
The club plays in the <a href="Mauritanean%20Premier%20League">Mauritanean Premier League</a>.
Stadium.
Currently the team plays at the 1000 capacity <a href="Stade%20Municipal%20Zou%C3%A9rate">Stade Municipal Zouérate</a>.
